title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - A day in the life of an AWS WAF administrator (NET317)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS WAF 管理员的一天 (NET317)
abstract: From sunrise alerts to sunset cost reports, the AWS WAF administrator’s day is never dull. Join us as we follow a fictional (but all-too-relatable) admin navigating setup, fine-tuning rules, building dashboards, and taming budgets - while outsmarting emerging threats before they bite. You’ll see how to adapt quickly to shifting traffic, uncover hidden risks, and make data-driven decisions without breaking the bank - or the application. Packed with tips, real-world examples, and a dash of bot traffic, this session turns the daily grind of web application protection into a well-architected adventure (edited)
abstract_cn: 从日出警报到日落成本报告，AWS WAF管理员的一天从不枯燥。加入我们，跟随一位虚构（但极其真实）的管理员，了解如何进行设置、微调规则、构建仪表板和控制预算——同时在新兴威胁造成损害之前智胜它们。您将看到如何快速适应不断变化的流量，发现隐藏风险，并在不超出预算或破坏应用程序的情况下做出数据驱动的决策。本次会议充满技巧、真实案例和少量机器人流量，将Web应用程序保护的日常工作转变为架构良好的冒险之旅。
